thread.title: Hong Kong’s first French steakhouse closing after 23 years, and owner blames Occupy protests in part for decision
thread.title_full: Hong Kong’s first French steakhouse closing after 23 years, and owner blames Occupy protests in part for decision

author: Bernice Chan
title: Hong Kong’s first French steakhouse closing after 23 years, and owner blames Occupy protests in part for decision
text:
Lifestyle › Food & Drink Hong Kong’s first French steakhouse closing after 23 years, and owner blames Occupy protests in part for decision 
W’s Entrecote never got over the impact of 11-week sit-in that shut prime street near its Causeway Bay location, says owner, who also cites rising rents and competition as reasons for pending closure PUBLISHED : Tuesday, 07 February, 2017, 6:59pm UPDATED : Tuesday, 07 February, 2017, 6:59pm
